comments:
When I'm using Eclipse 2.0 and files from  cdt_eclipse_initial_20020710.zip 
archive(from CDT Downloads) everything is ok.
 
 When I'm using Eclipse 2.0 and getting from CVS repository 
org.eclipse.cdt.core and org.eclipse.cdt.ui I can't launch ASM Editor. 

After associating *.asm with ASM Editor I'm trying to create .asm file but 
error occurs.  There appears a dialog "Problems Opening Editor" and .log 
consists of following strings(this is not all strings from .log):
